body_html:
Noise shape may be a Tensor where any of the dimensions are not known at graph build time; i.e., you can have noise_shape = tf.Placeholder(dtype=tf.int32, shape=None) ... or shape=[None, 3, 4]) ... or:

batch_size = tf.Placeholder(tf.int32, shape=())
noise_shape = tf.concat(0, [batch_size] + remaining_shape)
body_text:
Noise shape may be a Tensor where any of the dimensions are not known at graph build time; i.e., you can have noise_shape = tf.Placeholder(dtype=tf.int32, shape=None)  ... or shape=[None, 3, 4])  ... or:
batch_size = tf.Placeholder(tf.int32, shape=())
noise_shape = tf.concat(0, [batch_size] + remaining_shape)
body:
Noise shape may be a Tensor where any of the dimensions are not known at graph build time; i.e., you can have noise_shape = tf.Placeholder(dtype=tf.int32, shape=None)  ... or shape=[None, 3, 4])  ... or:

batch_size = tf.Placeholder(tf.int32, shape=())
noise_shape = tf.concat(0, [batch_size] + remaining_shape)
